entries.npc_msn_04_done_01: Good, get out of my sight.  I've had it with you too.
entries.npc_msn_04_decline: Oh my.  Well, I'll have to wait for someone else then...
entries.npc_msn_04_greeting_onothermission: Aren't you a little busy to be talking to me right now?
entries.npc_msn_04_friend_work_01: You should speak to my friend. There's work to be done, but it's far too dangerous for me!
entries.npc_msn_04_friend_greeting_onmission: Aren't you supposed to be helping my friend, here?
entries.npc_msn_04_greeting_onmission: Are you STILL not done with that job?
entries.npc_msn_04_presp_getmission_05: I've had about enough of you.
entries.npc_msn_04_presp_getmission_02: I can do whatever needs to be done.
entries.npc_msn_04_presp_getmission_01: Well, let's get to it then.
entries.npc_msn_04_work_02: I need this job done now.  Not later.  Now.
entries.npc_msn_04_busy_01: Not only are you late you're incompetent?  Is that what's happened?
entries.npc_msn_04_presp_greeting_02: About time?  What do you mean?
entries.npc_msn_04_greeting_01: Well it's about time you showed up.
